name: MiniCopter Flight 3D
description:
Pilot you own 'radioguided' MiniCopter 3D! Avoid obstacles and fly to the goal set on each level. Collect bonuses, complete various missions - pick up things and bring them to destination points.

How to play: Watch tutorials to learn how to pilot your minicopter with the help of the remote. Tilt left/right, up/down and adjust the angle. Touch an object with landing skids to pick it up.

- pilot a mini helicopter;
- accomplish missions;
- enjoy amazing 3D graphics.
